description:
The battle for the broadcast tower rages on as the civilian crew of No. 1 division infiltrates the control room.  But the Terraformars are there two! If they make any noise the trained killers of No. 4 Division will hear them, so they`re forced to continue their work in total silence as the killer cockroaches get every closer...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`âme de ceux qui n`ont rien
STRENGTH OF WEAKEST 持たざる者の魂
Strength of Weakest: Motazaru Mono no Tamashii
Strength of Weakest: The Soul of the Weakest
